overview:
Salesdriven marketeer with off- and online experience in consumer goods.

Martijn has joined various companies in their start-up phase: launching a product, assembling + managing a team and creating + improving brand value. International ambition. Martijn likes setting clear targets, monitoring them and adjusting plans where needed in order to overperform.

Specialties:

  • Start-ups;
  • Product (re)launches;
  • Brand & identity;
  • CPS strategy.
